00020 RenderTextureManager::~RenderTextureManager()
00021 {
00022         map<std::string, RenderTexture*>::const_iterator iter;
00023         for (iter = textures.begin(); iter != textures.end(); ++iter)
00024                 delete iter->second;
00025 
00026     manager = NULL;
00027 
00028         textures.clear();

00031 RenderTexture* RenderTextureManager::createRenderTexture(string name, int width, int height)
00032 {
00033     if (textures.find(name) == textures.end())
00034         textures[name] = new RenderTexture(name, width, height);
00035     else
00036         Utils::get()->writeToLog("RenderTexture with name [" + name + "] already exists, returning previously existing RenderTexture.");
00037     return textures[name];
00038 }
00039 
00040 RenderTexture* RenderTextureManager::getRenderTexture(string name)
00041 {
00042     if (textures.find(name) != textures.end())
00043         return textures[name];
00044     else
00045         return NULL;
00046 }
00047 
00048 void RenderTextureManager::destroyRenderTexture(string name)
00049 {
00050     if (textures.find(name) != textures.end())
00051         destroyRenderTexture(textures[name]);
00052     else
00053         Utils::get()->writeToLog("RenderTexture with name [" + name + "] does not exists, ignoring.");
00054 }
00055 
00056 void RenderTextureManager::destroyRenderTexture(RenderTexture* tex)
00057 {
00058     textures.erase(tex->getName());
00059     delete tex;
00060 }
00061 
00062 void RenderTextureManager::renderTextures()
00063 {
00064     map<string, RenderTexture*>::const_iterator iter;
00065     for (iter = textures.begin(); iter != textures.end(); ++iter)
00066         iter->second->render();
00067 }
00068 
00069 RenderTextureManager* RenderTextureManager::get()
00070 {
00071     if (manager == NULL)
00072         manager = new RenderTextureManager();
00073 
00074     return manager;
00075 }
